oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Battle of Gettysburg
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eight-page sheet music with a full color cover. On the cover is a color reproduction of Pickett's famous charge at Gettysburg. Companies selling this music are listed on the front cover.

Edward Taylor Paull (1858-1924) was an American composer and music publisher. He composed and published music that was considered a rival of John Philip Sousa. He was known for his many marches and for his popular color-lithographed song sheet covers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paull, E. T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Kenneth D. Rose Sheet Music Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gettysburg, Battle of, Gettysburg, Pa., 1863; Paull, E. T., 1858-1924
Sheet Music covers; Songs; Ballads; Campaigns & battles; Battlefields
